Title: Relates to increasing fines for repeated parking violations
Summary: Increases fines for more than ten repeated parking violations within a twenty-four month period.
LawCode: Amd ยง237, V & T L; amd ยง19-203, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law and the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to increasing fines for repeated parking violations
